name: Razor City Frenzy -Protologue
description:
Razor City Frenzy -Protologue- is a 25 - 30 minutes long prototype made in RPG Maker VX Ace in 3 weeks.

A city controlled by street gangs, knife duels everywhere, and a mysterious murder nobody can seem to understand.

Take control of Zipper and guide her through Razor City in an attempt to discover what happened to her boss.

Featuring a completely unique reflex based but at the same time balanced battle system, Accompanied by a stylish user interface, and gorgeous hand drawn graphics.

Ok, we are probably jerking ourselves too much with that description. It's a pretty nice game tho.

Thank you all so much for checking it out.

TEAM:
